mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dc_shell_setting (shell_name, shell_desc, system_type, system_version, code) VALUES (#{shellName}, #{shellDesc}, #{systemType}, #{systemVersion}, #{code})
mapper.select: SELECT count(0) FROM dc_shell_setting ssh WHERE ssh.is_delete = '0'
SELECT id serverId, server_type serverType FROM dc_config

SELECT @rownum :=@rownum + 1 AS serverId, system_version serverType FROM( SELECT DISTINCT CONCAT( dss.system_type, "_", dss.system_version ) system_version FROM dc_shell_setting dss) L1, (SELECT @rownum := 0) r
mapper.update: UPDATE dc_shell_setting ssh SET ssh.shell_name = #{shellName}, ssh.code =#{code}, ssh.shell_desc = #{shellDesc}, ssh.system_type = #{systemType}, system_version = #{systemVersion} WHERE ssh.id = #{id}
